ygData.messageBody:
> After Talking to a few dark elf sks we decided that
> giving us a good 1hand sword quest weapon and raising
> the cap a little on bash would be best for the human
> and dark elf sks. We decided maybe a 1hander around
> 12dmg 36dly and an effect of poison bolt or a weak
> lifetap i dunno thats up to you. its basically
> supposed to be like a ghoulbane. You could even make
> it human and de only if you like. This would help us
> because now we can carry a shield and have a decent
> 1hander instead of always having to carry a 2hander
> and lose the ability to bash which the large races do
> not....let me know what you think

A new 1HS weapon, just wonderful. As if carrying around the Dark Reaver and
Fleshripper weren't enough, now you want the SMALL guys to lug around a 1H
sword AND a shield too. Yay. My Str is only 97, and even with an EE Bag,
that stuff is still heavy. Not to mention a whole 'nother skill to keep up
with, ugh.

Better options:
1.) Give us kick. Humans and Dark Elves will use it, large races won't
(because they have slam). Also fits into the image of SKs being mean,
under-handed, intense damage-dealing tanks.
2.) Give us spells (like Banshee Aura) that are human/de only. Larges can
outsource to druids/mages for their damshields.
3.) Make some new human/de only items (not necessarily weapons). The easiest
way to do this is just make some new SK armor that is medium-sized, the
larges just can't wear em, but the human/de SKs can.

Dravith Vandre'i
